collection_strategy.description: Multi-tier collection strategy optimized for minimal API usage

high_frequency.rationale: BTC, ETH, XRP, SUI, and ENA are primary trading pairs and require frequent updates for accurate volatility and trend analysis

hourly.rationale: Hourly updates provide good balance between data freshness and API efficiency for portfolio diversification signals

macro.rationale: Macro indicators change slowly and daily updates provide sufficient granularity for correlation analysis

coingecko.notes: Well below rate limits with hourly collections for other assets

fred.notes: Extremely low utilization, only collecting macro data once daily

batching_strategies.crypto_assets: Individual API calls per asset to maintain granular error handling
batching_strategies.macro_indicators: Individual calls with built-in retry logic
batching_strategies.time_distribution: Spread collections throughout the day to avoid API spikes

health_checks.data_freshness: Monitor last successful collection time per asset
health_checks.api_response_times: Track API latency and failure rates
health_checks.storage_health: Monitor database performance and disk usage

api_failures.fallback_intervals: Temporarily increase intervals on repeated failures

network_issues.offline_mode: Continue with cached data and resume when connectivity restored

estimated_monthly_savings.api_costs: Minimal impact as CoinGecko free tier and FRED is free
estimated_monthly_savings.data_storage: Slower growth rate of time-series data
